mindless.translation[0].definitions[0].d: completely stupid and without any purpose
mindless.translation[0].definitions[0].e: His drinking bouts often ended in acts of mindless violence.
mindless.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if something is mindless, you can do it or watch it without thinking or using your mind
mindless.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Doug was watching something mindless on television.
the mindless routine of military discipline
